Title: Coherent ONU Designs for 50 Gb/s/λ PON
Source: Opt. Fiber Commun. Conf. Exhib., OFC - Proc.
Abstract: © 2019 OSA.The required complexity of coherent technology has always been a show-stopper in optical access networks. Here, the recent compelling research activities in low-complexity coherent PONs are reviewed, and their feasibility for 50 Gb/s/λ is investigated.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
